item.title: Large pothole - can’t be avoided and growing, 26th January
item.description:
Deep pothole which can’t be avoided. Pothole is growing in size. This is significant enough to cause “pinch puncture” in Lowe profile tyres or worse especially when filled with water and it becomes hard to spot. The pothole has been noticeable for about two weeks now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finlay Way, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive littering, 26th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeat report as potholes NOT repaired before and after roaf crossing, 26th January
item.description:
3 potholes next to Bayshill Road crossing Cheltenham Reported via mobile in the A pothole in road category anonymously at 04:24, Fri 21 November 2025 Sent to Gloucestershire County Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 8446448.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole Churchdown lane, 25th January
item.description:
